verses.text: Now \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w* was \w straitly|strong="H5462"\w* shut \w up|strong="H5462"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: none went \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, and none came \w in|strong="H0935"\w*.\f + \fr 6.1 \ft was…: Heb. did shut up, and was shut up\f*

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, \w See|strong="H7200"\w*, I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* into thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*, and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* thereof, \add and\add* the mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w* of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w*.

And ye shall \w compass|strong="H5437"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, all \add ye\add* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, \add and\add* go round \w about|strong="H5362"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w once|strong="H6471"\w*. Thus shalt thou \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

And \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w trumpets|strong="H7782"\w* of \w rams’ horns|strong="H3104"\w*: and the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* ye shall \w compass|strong="H5437"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w*, and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w blow|strong="H8628"\w* with the \w trumpets|strong="H7782"\w*.

And it shall come to pass, that when they make a \w long|strong="H4900"\w* \add blast\add* with the \w ram’s|strong="H3104"\w* \w horn|strong="H7161"\w*, \add and\add* when ye \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w*, all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w shout|strong="H7321"\w* with a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w shout|strong="H8643"\w*; and the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* shall fall \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w flat|strong="H8478"\w*, and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall ascend \w up|strong="H5927"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* straight before him.\f + \fr 6.5 \ft flat: Heb. under it\f*

¶ And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Take \w up|strong="H5375"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, and let \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w trumpets|strong="H7782"\w* of \w rams’ horns|strong="H3104"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, Pass \w on|strong="H5674"\w*, and \w compass|strong="H5437"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and let him that is \w armed|strong="H2502"\w* pass \w on|strong="H5674"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ And it came to pass, when \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* had \w spoken|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, that the \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w bearing|strong="H5375"\w* the \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w trumpets|strong="H7782"\w* of \w rams’ horns|strong="H3104"\w* passed \w on|strong="H5674"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w blew|strong="H8628"\w* with the \w trumpets|strong="H7782"\w*: and the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w followed|strong="H1980"\w* \w them|strong="H0310"\w*.

¶ And the \w armed|strong="H2502"\w* men \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* that \w blew|strong="H8628"\w* with the \w trumpets|strong="H7782"\w*, and the \w rereward|strong="H0622"\w* \w came|strong="H1980"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w*, \add the priests\add* going \w on|strong="H1980"\w*, and \w blowing|strong="H8628"\w* with the \w trumpets|strong="H7782"\w*.\f + \fr 6.9 \ft rereward: Heb. gathering host\f*

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* had \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Ye shall not \w shout|strong="H7321"\w*, nor make any \w noise|strong="H8085"\w* with your \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, neither shall \add any\add* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w proceed|strong="H3318"\w* out of your \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, until the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* I \w bid|strong="H0559"\w* you \w shout|strong="H7321"\w*; then shall ye \w shout|strong="H7321"\w*.\f + \fr 6.10 \ft any noise…: Heb. your voice to be heard\f*

So the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w compassed|strong="H5437"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, going \w about|strong="H5362"\w* \add it\add* \w once|strong="H6471"\w*: and they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, and \w lodged|strong="H3885"\w* in the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*.

¶ And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* rose \w early|strong="H7925"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* took \w up|strong="H5375"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w bearing|strong="H5375"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w trumpets|strong="H7782"\w* of \w rams’ horns|strong="H3104"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* went \w on|strong="H1980"\w* \w continually|strong="H1980"\w*, and \w blew|strong="H8628"\w* with the \w trumpets|strong="H7782"\w*: and the armed \w men|strong="H2502"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them; but the \w rereward|strong="H0622"\w* \w came|strong="H1980"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \add the priests\add* going \w on|strong="H1980"\w*, and \w blowing|strong="H8628"\w* with the \w trumpets|strong="H7782"\w*.

And the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* they \w compassed|strong="H5437"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w once|strong="H6471"\w*, and \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* into the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*: so they \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

And it came to pass on the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, that they rose \w early|strong="H7925"\w* about the \w dawning|strong="H5927"\w* of the \w day|strong="H7837"\w*, and \w compassed|strong="H5437"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* after the same \w manner|strong="H4941"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w*: only on that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* they \w compassed|strong="H5437"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w*.

And it came to pass at the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w time|strong="H6471"\w*, when the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w blew|strong="H8628"\w* with the \w trumpets|strong="H7782"\w*, \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w Shout|strong="H7321"\w*; for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* you the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

¶ And the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* shall be \w accursed|strong="H2764"\w*, \add even\add* it, and all that \add are\add* therein, to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: only \w Rahab|strong="H7343"\w* the \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w* shall \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, she and all that \add are\add* with her in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, because she \w hid|strong="H2244"\w* the \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* that we \w sent|strong="H7971"\w*.\f + \fr 6.17 \ft accursed: or, devoted\f*

And ye, in any \w wise|strong="H7535"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \add yourselves\add* from the accursed \w thing|strong="H2764"\w*, lest ye make \add yourselves\add* \w accursed|strong="H2763"\w*, when ye \w take|strong="H3947"\w* of the accursed \w thing|strong="H2764"\w*, and \w make|strong="H7760"\w* the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* a \w curse|strong="H2764"\w*, and \w trouble|strong="H5916"\w* it.\f + \fr 6.18 \ft accursed: or, devoted\f*\f + \fr 6.18 \ft a curse: or, devoted\f*

But all the \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w brass|strong="H5178"\w* and \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*, \add are\add* \w consecrated|strong="H6944"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: they shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w treasury|strong="H0214"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 6.19  t consecrated: Heb. holiness *

So the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w shouted|strong="H7321"\w* when \add the priests\add* \w blew|strong="H8628"\w* with the \w trumpets|strong="H7782"\w*: and it came to pass, when the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w*, and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w shouted|strong="H7321"\w* with a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w shout|strong="H8643"\w*, that the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* fell down \w flat|strong="H5307"\w*, so that the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* straight before him, and they \w took|strong="H3920"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.\f + \fr 6.20 \ft flat: Heb. under it\f*

And they utterly \w destroyed|strong="H2763"\w* all that \add was\add* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, both \w man|strong="H0376"\w* and \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, \w young|strong="H5288"\w* and \w old|strong="H2205"\w*, and \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*, and \w sheep|strong="H7716"\w*, and \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*, with the \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

But \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* had \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that had spied \w out|strong="H7270"\w* the \w country|strong="H0776"\w*, \w Go|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w harlot’s|strong="H2181"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and bring \w out|strong="H3318"\w* thence the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, and all that she hath, as ye \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto her.

And the young \w men|strong="H5288"\w* that were \w spies|strong="H7270"\w* went \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, and brought \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w Rahab|strong="H7343"\w*, and her \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and her \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, and her \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, and all that she had; and they brought \w out|strong="H3318"\w* all her \w kindred|strong="H4940"\w*, and \w left|strong="H3240"\w* them \w without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 6.23 \ft kindred: Heb. families\f*

And they \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and all that \add was\add* therein: only the \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and the \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w brass|strong="H5178"\w* and of \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*, they \w put|strong="H5414"\w* into the \w treasury|strong="H0214"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w saved|strong="H2421"\w* \w Rahab|strong="H7343"\w* the \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w* \w alive|strong="H2421"\w*, and her \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w*, and all that she had; and she \w dwelleth|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H7130"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add even\add* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*; because she \w hid|strong="H2244"\w* the \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w*, which \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to spy \w out|strong="H7270"\w* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*.

¶ And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w adjured|strong="H7650"\w* \add them\add* at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \add be\add* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that riseth \w up|strong="H6965"\w* and \w buildeth|strong="H1129"\w* this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*: he shall lay the \w foundation|strong="H3245"\w* thereof in his \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*, and in his \w youngest|strong="H6810"\w* \add son\add* shall he set \w up|strong="H5324"\w* the \w gates|strong="H1817"\w* of it.
So the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was with \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*; and his \w fame|strong="H8089"\w* was \add noised\add* throughout all the \w country|strong="H0776"\w*.
